title: Now that CotC/the Resolve tree is completely useless-
body: What keystone are all you CotC users flocking to instead? As a top main I'm thinking Fervor or TLD myself.

replies.body: Windspeakers. Anyone dumb enough to decide CoC is useless is probably running gold/5 quints anyway.
As Quinn it's Thunderlord/Fervor, but for tank it's still CoC, it's not nerfed yet, it will get nerfed soon as the PBE cycle showed.

I'm split between "the nerf really isn't that terrible, and even becomes a buff when diving into 4 or 5 person teams", and mocking riot's original statement of "I know we're going kind of extreme, and intend to pull back", and then them never pulling the numbers back. It's genuinely hard right now.

The problem is the champions that actually want to dive in against 4 or 5 person teams like {{champion:32}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:54}} already have 2 seconds of CC. A 3 second shield is useless during that time.
I like DFT. It becomes really weak late game but it gives you a nice edge during the trades since it keeps burning them
Is it now useless because it was nerfed and became "balanced"? Lmao

They swung too hard. The CD, the duration, the power of the shield? It's all too much. They did the same thing with Grasp - which is even more useless. There's 0 point in going full Resolve anymore. I bet you're not going Resolve either.

Stormraider's unless you're hard engage.

Plus 12/18/0 offers more to most champs than 18/12/0.
